# Zensical Migration Decision Timeline Template

Use this timeline to track key migration decisions chronologically.

## Timeline entries

| Date/time | Decision | Context | Owner | Evidence | Outcome |
|---|---|---|---|---|---|
|  |  |  |  |  |  |

## Usage notes

1. Add one row for each major decision gate.
2. Link evidence to PRs, run logs, or decision records.
3. Capture the resulting outcome for traceability.
